channel.title: Community Links on Typhon Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Community Links on Typhon Wiki

item.title: Forums
item.description: Forums # Dreadbox maintains a Facebook page with new announcements and some occasional Q&A. This Elektronauts thread has several owners and has been a good place to track the first few months of people experiences. A lot of info on this site was lifted from this thread.

item.title: Tutorial Videos
item.description: Tutorial Videos # Loopop has posted a very good walkthrough of the Typhon explaining how the oscillator & filter adjustments work, how to use the modulators and FX, as well as some example patch ideas. The step mod section is especially helpful and includes a chart going from the 0-100 range to semitones. This video used the v1.1 firmware, so some of the newer FX are not covered.
